alert.note: Alert for Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area; Southern Inner Channels (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 05 at 2:35PM AKDT until April 06 at 11:00PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 11 PM AKDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area and Southern Inner Channels, including Hydaburg, Craig, Metlakatla, Ketchikan, Kasaan, and Thorne Bay. * WHEN...From 1 PM to 11 PM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for aviation and high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: A high wind warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring.. Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area; Southern Inner Channels
